short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Showing a tooltip with a human readable date of a highlighted Unix timestamp.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will monitor text selection in the page. If it detects an epoch timestamp is selected, it will show the ISO date of it, in a tooltip
